subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce scored 21 points, Rasheed Wallace had 20 and the Boston Celtics remained unbeaten with a 105-74 victory over the 76ers in Philadelphia on Tuesday night.
snippet: Paul Pierce scored 21 points, Rasheed Wallace had 20 and the Boston Celtics remained unbeaten with a 105-74 victory over the 76ers in Philadelphia on Tuesday night.
